name: Low Heart (1HGJ)
description:
This game is made for the 136th 1Hour Game Jam : The more you have, the worse it is

You have to survive 1 minutes and have the lovest heart number. But if your heart number arrived to 0, you died; and if you have more than 5 heart, you loose to.

Heart : Add 1 heart to your counter

Bad guys : Remove 1 heart from your counter

Control

Keybord arrow to move.

You can have the Game's Files and Sprites on my Patreon Page.
